tiles.title: Now available: Service credentials secret type
tiles.description: Secrets Manager now provides support to create and manage IBM Cloud Resource keys for supported services, such as HMAC keys, SASL credentials, TLS certificates and more.

tiles.title: Madrid availability
tiles.description: Users can now create instances of Secret Manager in the Madrid region.

tiles.title: Updated Secrets Manager UI
tiles.description: An updated version of the Secrets Manager UI is now available and includes features for viewing the secret value, viewing the value of the secret engine configuration, a new Create Secret dialog, and more.

tiles.title: Now available: Get secret value by name
tiles.description: Users can now get a secret and its details by specifying the name and type of the secret through the API. This functionality is also available in CLI and SDKs.
